channel.title: Certifications on Luca Berton's Website, Blog and all the Cool Stuff. Web is my playground!
channel.description: Recent content in Certifications on Luca Berton's Website, Blog and all the Cool Stuff. Web is my playground!

item.title: Linux Foundation LFCE certification
item.description: Obtained Linux Foundation LFCE (Linux Foundation Certified Engineer) certification! Linux Foundation_LFCE_certificate.pdf (passed on 3th December 2017) The Linux Foundation is the foundation that support the development of Linux and others OpenSource initiatives worldwide. The Linux creator “Linus Torvalds“ works under its umbrella and hosts kernel.org website. A LFCE (Linux Foundation Certified Engineer) certified engineer possesses in depth skills of Linux system and is responsible for the design and implementation of system architecture.

item.title: Google Academy for Ads achievements
item.description: Achievements earned in Google Academy for Ads: Google Web Designer Basics certificate (passed on 9th October 2017) DoubleClick Dynamic Creative Basics certificate (passed on 6th November 2017) I’m on the Rich Media Gallery Certified Users list.
